text: Manuel De Sica (24 February 1949 – 5 December 2014) was an Italian composer. He was born in Rome, Italy. In 1993, De Sica won the Nastro d'Argento for Best Score for Carlo Verdone's Al lupo, al lupo. In 1996, he won the David di Donatello for Best Score for Carlo Lizzani's Celluloide. In 2005, he was honored with the title of Commendatore of the Italian Republic. Sica died of a heart attack in Rome on 5 December 2014, aged 65.Morto d’infarto il musicista Manuel De Sica, fratello di Christian ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1949 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:20th-century Italian composers Category:Musicians from Rome Category:21st-century Italian composers
title: Manuel De Sica
